name: Stayin' Alive!
description:
Stayin' Alive is a intense hack and slash survival game in which you test your battling ability's to the max to see how long you can survive in a retro biased cave against endless waves of unique enemies.

How long can you survive ?!

Controls: 

W,A ,S,D/ Arrow keys: To move

Space Bar: Jump

Num1: Light attack

Num2: Heavy attack

Num3: Ranged attack
